question_text: Which statement best explains why DSL throughput varies by location?
answer_options: It depends on the DOCSIS revision used by the modem.
It’s affected by local weather conditions.
It depends on how many devices are using the modem.
It’s limited by distance from the central office.
correct_answer: It’s limited by distance from the central office.
explanation: DSL performance degrades as distance from the provider’s central office increases due to signal attenuation over copper lines.
